page.shortlink: UX viewbox properties global events on click
page.description: This defines a default onClick event that fires whenever an item in the viewbox is clicked on.

section.description: If an onClick event is tied to a specific item's definition, then this localized event will be used in place of the default. The default onClick event only fires if an item does NOT contain an onClick event definition. Local events can be assigned to an item in the [Javascript] section on the items pane of the viewbox builder
